You\'ll need this key to import your backup later. Please keep it in a safe place. Alternatively, you can use the QR code below.

You\'ll get a new ginlo ID.\nAll your existing chats, media, and contacts will be gone.

We couldn\'t find a backup.
However, you can create one now if you\'re still logged in to the ginlo Business app on another smartphone. It works like this:
Open ginlo Business on your other smartphone.
Now let\'s find your backup.
Using your backup, you can get your existing content in here.
You can set a password for backup recovery here. This password will not be stored. If you forget it, your backup cannot be imported. For this reason, do not forget your password.

Add your e-mail address to your company\'s e-mail directory to find colleagues with e-mail addresses from the same company. We never access your details in plain text.

Unfortunately, we couldn\'t find any contacts whose business e-mail address with the %1$s domain is linked with the account.\n\nAdvise colleagues who are already using ginlo Business to link an e-mail address.

ginlo encrypts all your messages in a secure and reliable manner as they travel from your device to the recipient\'s device — the messages can\'t even be read from our servers. ginlo also offers a number of other features that make your communication as secure as possible:
You have met in person and scanned the QR code
Your contact is using ginlo. Ask them.
You have already been in contact via ginlo.
Your communication security level
Keep track of your contacts
The symbols indicate the status of your message
Determines how many minutes the program will be running in the background before it requests your password.
Determines whether ginlo Business automatically creates a backup of your account information. The backup will be stored securely on the server.
Choose the image you want to display as a background in the chats.
If you activate this option, all media that you receive is automatically saved on your smartphone and can be viewed outside of ginlo Business.
Deleting your account will irreversibly delete all of your chat history and ginlo media. Your backups will become unusable.
